approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw from the caller’s account up to the amount specified.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens directly from the caller’s address to another address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from a specified address to another address, using the allowance mechanism.

setPrecrime.description: Sets the precrime address for the contract.

setReceiveVersion.description: Sets the version for receiving messages.

setSendVersion.description: Sets the version for sending messages.

setTrustedRemote.description: Sets the trusted remote address for a given source chain ID.

setTrustedRemoteAddress.description: Sets the trusted remote address for a given remote chain ID.

setUseCustomAdapterParams.description: Sets whether to use custom adapter parameters.

setWhitelist.description: Sets or unsets a whitelist status for an address.

setConfig.description: Sets configuration for a specified version, chain ID, and config type.

setFeeBp.description: Sets the fee basis points for a specific destination chain.

setDefaultFeeBp.description: Sets the default fee basis points.

setFeeOwner.description: Sets the address that owns the fee.

setInboundCap.description: Sets the inbound cap for a specific chain ID.

setOutboundCap.description: Sets the outbound cap for a specific chain ID.

setMinDstGas.description: Sets the minimum gas required for a specific destination chain and packet type.

pause.description: Pauses the contract, preventing certain actions.

unpause.description: Unpauses the contract, resuming normal operations.

forceResumeReceive.description: Forces the resumption of receiving messages for a given source chain.

sharedDecimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places used by the token.

supportsInterface.description: Checks if the contract implements a given interface.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

useCustomAdapterParams.description: Checks if custom adapter parameters are used.

whitelist.description: Checks if an address is whitelisted.
